!Command: show running-config
!Running configuration last done at: Mon Jan 20 10:00:00 2025
!Time: Mon Jan 20 10:15:00 2025

version 9.3(5) Bios:version 07.67
hostname NXOS-SPINE-01

feature ssh
feature interface-vlan
feature lacp
feature vpc

no password strength-check
username admin password 5 $5$ABCDEF$hashhashhashhashhashhashhashhash role network-admin

banner motd #
Unauthorized access prohibited.
#

ssh key rsa 2048

vlan 1
vlan 10
  name SERVERS
vlan 20
  name USERS

vrf context management
  ip route 0.0.0.0/0 10.0.0.254

interface Vlan1
  no shutdown
  ip address 10.0.0.2/24

interface Ethernet1/1
  description Uplink-to-Spine
  switchport mode trunk
  switchport trunk allowed vlan 1,10,20

interface Ethernet1/2
  description Server-01
  switchport access vlan 10

interface mgmt0
  vrf member management
  ip address 192.168.1.2/24

line console
line vty
  session-limit 10

end
